page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The main employment in this area is connected with{agricultural based {occupations.}Principally this is direct farming but Lackham College provides employment for tutors and ancilliary staff.There is also a small business specialising in maintenance of agricultural machinery. {The Bowden Park Estate}provides work for 20 people as house staff, gardeners, and estate workers. {A Riding School}is situated in the block which provides both full and part time employment. The area also acts as a{dormitory for the nearby towns of Melksham and Chippenham which contain manufacturing industries (Avon Rubber)Tyres and Railway equipment (Westinghouse) as well as clerical and other office situations.{The National Trust}also employs people in this area.
